trans-unit.source: Contains the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TabletDevice"></xref> objects that represent the digitizer devices of a tablet device.
trans-unit.target: 包含<xref href="System.Windows.Input.TabletDevice"></xref>代表平板電腦裝置的數位板裝置物件。

trans-unit.source: Copies all elements in the current collection to the specified one-dimensional array, starting at the specified destination array index.
trans-unit.target: 所有項目複製到指定的一維陣列，指定的目的陣列索引開始，目前的集合。

trans-unit.source: The one-dimensional array that is the destination of elements copied from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 從集合複製之項目的目的端一維陣列。

trans-unit.source: The array must have zero-based indexing.
trans-unit.target: 陣列必須有以零為起始的索引。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index in the array parameter where copying begins.
trans-unit.target: 開始複製處的陣列參數中以零為起始的索引。

trans-unit.source: If index + collection count is greater than or equal to array.length.
trans-unit.target: 如果 index 集合計數為大於或等於 + array.length 。

trans-unit.source: If array is .
trans-unit.target: If array is .

trans-unit.source: If index is less than 0 or index is greater than or equal to array.length.
trans-unit.target: If index is less than 0 or index is greater than or equal to array.length.

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TabletDevice"></xref> objects in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 取得數目<xref href="System.Windows.Input.TabletDevice"></xref>集合中的物件。

trans-unit.source: The number of <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TabletDevice"></xref> objects in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 數目<xref href="System.Windows.Input.TabletDevice"></xref>集合中的物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether access to the collection is synchronized (thread safe).
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指示對集合的存取是否為同步 （安全執行緒）。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if access to the collection is synchronized (thread safe); otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果對集合的存取為同步 （安全執行緒），否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TabletDevice"></xref> object at the specified index within the collection.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.Windows.Input.TabletDevice"></xref>集合內指定索引處的物件。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TabletDevice"></xref> that is retrieved from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 以零為起始的索引<xref href="System.Windows.Input.TabletDevice"> </xref> ，從集合中擷取。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TabletDevice"></xref> object at the specified index within the collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TabletDevice"> </xref>集合內指定索引處的物件。

trans-unit.source: If index is less than 0 or index is greater than or equal to the number of objects in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 如果 index 小於 0 或 index 大於或等於數目集合中的物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets an object that can be used to synchronize access to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 取得物件，可以用來對集合同步存取。

trans-unit.source: An object that can be used to synchronize access to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 物件，可用來對集合進行同步存取。

trans-unit.source: This member supports the .NET Framework and is not intended to be used from your code.
trans-unit.target: 此成員支援.NET Framework 並不是從您的程式碼使用。

trans-unit.source: The array.
trans-unit.target: 陣列。

trans-unit.source: The index.
trans-unit.target: 索引。

trans-unit.source: This member supports the .NET Framework and is not intended to be used from your code.
trans-unit.target: 此成員支援.NET Framework 並不是從您的程式碼使用。

trans-unit.target: 此成員支援.NET Framework 並不是從您的程式碼使用。
